title.rendered: Gottwals Voted Best of the Best + Kids Corner Week 5

content.rendered:
Gottwals Voted Best of the Best

Middle Georgia, you’ve made it abundantly clear that you appreciate what we do! Thank you for voting us #1 Bookstore in Houston County and #2 Bookstore in Macon. We plan to keep offering you the BEST selection, the BEST trade-in value, and the BEST staff available. Regardless of which Gottwals Books location you choose, we hope your shopping experience is always great. According to your feedback, it must be!

Kids Corner Week 5 Guest Reader: Chick-fil-A Owner and Operator Pat Braski!

T-Shirt Design Contest Deadline Extended to 6/30

Don’t pass up this opportunity to have your art on our swag! The deadline for our t-shirt design contest is June 30th. Send in your designs to office@gottwalsbooks.com. We will have a special prize package for the winner(s)!

Contest Rules & Details

We are movin’ and shakin’ at our main warehouse in Byron, GA! This week, our crew is re-organizing, loading trucks with bookshelves, and sweating… a LOT. These guys are a major part of Gottwals Books and Walls of Books. You won’t often see them in the bookstores, but their warehouse efforts don’t go unnoticed! It takes many great people to operate this company. We are blessed with a remarkable staff.
